alert.note: Alert for Baca (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 02 at 3:57PM MDT until October 02 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Baca County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 357 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Stonington, or 19 miles southeast of Springfield, moving northeast at 75 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Walsh, Campo and Stonington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
